title: Executive Order 5997-Classification of Dirrelle Chaney
content: Dirrelle Chaney, who, since May 16, 1921, has been serving in a position in the Post Office Department excepted from civil-service requirements, may be appointed in the classified service without compliance with civil-service rules.
This order is issued upon the recommendation of the Postmaster General.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5997-Classification of Dirrelle Chaney Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361551
